ExtendedSection.Title: Add new fields to the content schema

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The resource types app, in the first step, created a basic XML schema document with already four data fields available: Title, Text, Image, and LinkURI. The fields are defined inside an <xsd:sequence> element, which means, that the fields are stored in exactly this order, and also—in this order—appear in the form editor. Each of the four fields has another type, namely OpenCmsString, OpenCmsHtml, OpenCmsVfsFile, OpenCmsVarLink. Above that, the resource types app inserted a <resourcebundles> element for localization and a <FieldSettings> element for data and UI configuration.
